you_kitten_1: Rest now, little one. Dream of the great warrior you'll become one day.
you_kitten_2: Hey, kit! Let's practice the hunting crouch.
[t_c inspects you as you get into position.]
Hmm, not bad! You'll be a great hunter one day.
you_kitten_3: Heh, you didn't see me coming, did you, little one?
One day you'll be as sneaky as me.
you_kitten_4: It's important to listen and learn, little y_c. This clan relies on each of us doing our part.
you_kitten_5: Oh! Be careful near the brambles, dear kit. It's easy to get hurt.
you_kitten_6: Stay close to your mentor, once you're an apprentice.
c_nClan's territory spans thousands of tail-lengths. It's easy to get lost if you wander too far.
